organic.title: Re: Community Server Under Attack by DDOS from China

Because of this, there are always people who want to monopolize this market, So someone learned how to launch a DDoS attack. At the same ...

organic.title: Re: So much DDOS attacks and kids with WH running ...
organic.snippet: DDOS attacks are pretty rare, I doubt they're what you are experiencing. When there is a DDOS attack then pretty much the whole server is affected, meaning multiple lobbies. These kind large scale things are pretty rare, so they are most likely using some other method to achieve this.

organic.title: BF4's server has been frequently attacked recently
organic.snippet: In the past half month, there have been people using DDOS and EA server backend bugs to attack players' servers. During the game battle, all players suddenly experience severe lag and crashes, or simply collapse. The connection between the game prompt and the server was lost, and the server was ...
